What's the craic fam. I'm David Jackson Shawe and I'm a designer, a developer, a maker.

I'm also sort of an ethical marketer... and I'm based in County Down Northern Ireland.

Podcast

You might know that I've launched a personal podcast. Episode 01 is out and you can listen for free at /podcast.
I'll be be updating it regularly, so stay tunned and get subscribed. Episode 01 is a solocast and I introduce myself, my why and hint at the topic of intuition.

Work

I run my own business and trade as Invisible Building. We sell web to local business and creatives.
